movie.title: The Night Before the Night Before Christmas
movie.title_english: The Night Before the Night Before Christmas
movie.title_long: The Night Before the Night Before Christmas (2010)
movie.description_intro: When Santa sets off on his Christmas duties a day early, crashes into the Fox family's house, ends up with amnesia and loses his magic sack of presents, he needs help! But the Fox family are a modern and broken family. Can they help him? The parents are preoccupied with work and the kids aren't very festive. But it's up to them to help Santa find his magical bag of toys and the clock is ticking or Christmas will be ruined. Forced to set their own problems aside and work together the Fox family rediscover how much they enjoy being together and realise that maybe they need to reprioritise their lives. The Night Before The Night Before Christmas is a crazy Christmas fantasy for all the family, brimming with festive spirit.
movie.description_full: When Santa sets off on his Christmas duties a day early, crashes into the Fox family's house, ends up with amnesia and loses his magic sack of presents, he needs help! But the Fox family are a modern and broken family. Can they help him? The parents are preoccupied with work and the kids aren't very festive. But it's up to them to help Santa find his magical bag of toys and the clock is ticking or Christmas will be ruined. Forced to set their own problems aside and work together the Fox family rediscover how much they enjoy being together and realise that maybe they need to reprioritise their lives. The Night Before The Night Before Christmas is a crazy Christmas fantasy for all the family, brimming with festive spirit.

movies.title: Jim Button and Luke the Engine Driver
movies.title_english: Jim Button and Luke the Engine Driver
movies.title_long: Jim Button and Luke the Engine Driver (2018)
movies.summary: An orphan boy in search of his origin. A young princess held prisoner in deadly Dragon City. Jim and his friend Luke discovering mysterious lands on the quest of a lifetime.
movies.description_full: An orphan boy in search of his origin. A young princess held prisoner in deadly Dragon City. Jim and his friend Luke discovering mysterious lands on the quest of a lifetime.
movies.synopsis: An orphan boy in search of his origin. A young princess held prisoner in deadly Dragon City. Jim and his friend Luke discovering mysterious lands on the quest of a lifetime.

movies.title: Blackbird
movies.summary: A young singer struggles with his sexuality and the treatment of others while coming of age in a small Southern Baptist community.
movies.description_full: A young singer struggles with his sexuality and the treatment of others while coming of age in a small Southern Baptist community.
movies.synopsis: A young singer struggles with his sexuality and the treatment of others while coming of age in a small Southern Baptist community.

movies.title: Lost Lovers
movies.summary: Takeru, a young rebel, is traveling alone in the North of Honshu. He once used to practice pole vaulting but he gave up and became a robber. Along his trip he crosses the path of a young couple doing a performance for a super market. Fascinated by both of them but probably a bit attracted by the mysterious silent girl, he decides to follow them.

movies.summary: An epidemic of mutant monster babies sweeps America.
